title: Please keep loading indicator spinning while page is not fully loaded/displayed
body: Often when a page loads, loading indicator disappears very quickly, and I don't have visual feedback that somethings are being processed in background, I just get an empty page, and when I start to think that the link is dead or something else went wrong, page suddenly appears.

comments.body: This is the main reason I'm not using Edge. That is a so bad UX. Please fix it.
